price: Wakifurushwa. Na wanayo adhabu ya kudumu.
footnotes: Hufukuzwa hao kwa nguvu wasifikilie kuweza kusikiliza khabari za mbinguni. Na Akhera watapata adhabu kali ya kudumu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
